meanings.sent1: I overwork myself by staying up late to finish my homework.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overwork during busy seasons at the office.
meanings.sent3: Don't overwork yourself trying to impress others; take breaks and relax.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his job sometimes leads him to overwork, neglecting his health.
meanings.sent5: The machine will overwork if you don't follow the recommended usage limits.

meanings.sent1: The demanding boss tends to overwork his employees with unrealistic deadlines.
meanings.sent2: Parents should not overwork their children with too many extracurricular activities.
meanings.sent3: The teacher didn't mean to overwork the students with the challenging assignment.
meanings.sent4: The heavy workload can overwork even the most dedicated employees.
meanings.sent5: The marathon training plan should challenge but not overwork the body.
